author: ekoneil
msg: Adding target to create a Beehive-enabled webapp from the dev build.
Add build file (build-dev.xml) that will build such a webapp in the context of a Beehive dev environment.

author: unico
msg: add a flag to the wrapper environment telling it whether to wrap the response or not
because forwarding redirects from the treeprocessor must not be handled with a wrapped response

author: kentam
msg: Database control now supports parameter substitution by name.  Parameter substitution
by position is no longer supported, as substitution by name is a much better approach.
